name: schedule
description:
Provides a programmatic interface to the scheduling engine. You can run a specified
page at scheduled intervals with the option to write out static HTML pages. This lets you offer users
access to pages that publish data, such as reports, without forcing users to wait while a database transaction
is performed in order to populate the data on the page.

params.name: action
params.description:
- delete: deletes the specified task
- update: updates an existing task or creates a new task, if one with the name specified by the task attribute does not exist
- run: executes the specified task
- list: list all scheduled tasks defined
- pause: pause execution of the defined scheduled task
- resume: resume execution of a paused scheduled task

params.name: serverpassword
params.description: allow you to access filesystem, also when access is denied for your context

params.name: hidden
params.description: if set to true the scheduled task is not displayed in the Lucee Administrator.

params.name: readonly
params.description: if set to true the scheduled task can not be modified or deleted in the Lucee Administrator.

params.name: task
params.description: The name of the task to delete, update, or run.

params.name: operation
params.description:
The type of operation the scheduler performs when executing this task.

- HTTPRequest: make a http(s) request to the url provided

params.name: paused
params.description: if set to true the scheduled task is paused.

params.name: file
params.description: Required with publish ='Yes' A valid filename for the published file.

params.name: path
params.description: Required with publish ='Yes' The path location for the published file.

params.name: startdate
params.description: Required when action ='update'. The date when scheduling of the task should start.

params.name: starttime
params.description:
Required when creating tasks with action = 'update'. Enter a value in seconds. The time when
	scheduling of the task starts.

params.name: url
params.description: Required when action = 'update'. The URL to be executed.

params.name: publish
params.description: Specifies whether the result should be saved to a file.

params.name: enddate
params.description: The date when the scheduled task ends.

params.name: endtime
params.description: The time when the scheduled task ends. Enter a value in seconds.

params.name: interval
params.description:
Required when creating tasks with action = 'update'. Interval at which task should be scheduled.
Can be set in seconds or as Once, Daily, Weekly, and Monthly. The default interval is one hour. The
minimum interval is 10 seconds.

params.name: requesttimeout
params.description:
Customizes the requestTimeOut for the task operation. Can be used to extend the default timeout
for operations that require more time to execute. Value in seconds.

params.name: username
params.description: Username if URL is protected.

params.name: password
params.description: Password if URL is protected.

params.name: proxyserver
params.description: Host name or IP address of a proxy server.

params.name: proxyuser
params.description: User name to provide to the proxy server.

params.name: proxypassword
params.description: Password to provide to the proxy server.

params.name: useragent
params.description: User agent request header.

params.name: resolveurl
params.description: Specifies whether to resolve links in the result page to absolute references.

params.name: port
params.description:
The port number on the server from which the task is being scheduled. Default is 80. When used
with resolveURL, the URLs of retrieved documents that specify a port number are automatically resolved
to preserve links in the retrieved document.

params.name: proxyport
params.description:
The port number on the proxy server from which the task is being requested. Default is 80. When
used with resolveURL, the URLs of retrieved documents that specify a port number are automatically
resolved to preserve links in the retrieved document.

params.name: result
params.description: Return variable name of action list. Result attribute doesn't work with other actions.

params.name: autodelete
params.description: if set to true, the scheduled task get deleted when there is no possible future execution.

params.name: unique
params.description: if set to true, the scheduled task is only executed once at time.if a task is still running from previous round no new task is started.
